solution_line_template: On the bus, the number of Dutch people was {dutch_fraction} of the total number, a total of {dutch_fraction}*{total_people_on_bus} = <<{dutch_fraction}*{total_people_on_bus}={num_dutch_people}>>{num_dutch_people} people.

Out of the {num_dutch_people} people who were Dutch, {dutch_american_fraction} were Dutch Americans, a total of {dutch_american_fraction}*{num_dutch_people} = <<{dutch_american_fraction}*{num_dutch_people}={num_dutch_americans}>>{num_dutch_americans} people.

If {window_seat_fraction} of the passengers on the bus identifying as Dutch Americans sat at the windows, their number is {window_seat_fraction}*{num_dutch_americans} = <<{window_seat_fraction}*{num_dutch_americans}={num_dutch_americans_window_seats}>>{num_dutch_americans_window_seats}
